name: 1st Contact
tag_list: financial-solutions, immigration, tax, payroll, limited-company, umbrella-company, contractor, accounting
overview:
1st Contact is an expert financial services and immigration group that offers a uniquely refreshing approach to financial and migration solutions. We make it our responsibility to connect forward thinking individuals to untapped financial and tax opportunities within the UK. 1st Contact is here to afford you the opportunity to pursue your life, career and travel aspirations with confidence and ease.

Live your life and boost your career in the UK – Let 1st Contact take care of the rest

A fiercely customer-focused business based on sincere and professional service, 1st Contact has been established since 1995. The company has since mushroomed into a multi-national operation with 3 offices in London, Melbourne and Cape Town. 1st Contact prides itself as a highly credible resource, with over 60% of all new business being word-of-mouth referrals from existing clients.

Today, 1st Contact has 160 professional staff members, 300 000 current clients and an excess of £25 Million in annual sales. Having serviced over 1 million clients across all product lines, 1st Contact is now the largest tax agent in the UK.

Let your solution be our challenge – 1st Contact offers sincere advice and professional service
